productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 54 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I started having issues with carpel tunnel of my wrist. So far this keyboard has helped a lot. If you are not used to ergonomic keyboard it will take some time to get used to one. The keys and mouse are a bit stiff but I am sure it will be fine once I break them in.This was the cheapest keyboard and mouse set I could find on Amazon. The item arrived overnight so that was great. Everything was so easy to connect and the computer even prompt me when I plugged the USB piece in. Definitely worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only 1 USB Port for Both
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic product, and evidently it can be used with either Mac or PC. I tested mine on the PC. I was extremely surprised to find just 1 USB comm dongle for the set. Other brands I have tried actually needed 2 different ports. I'm using them now, straight plug-and-play; no third party software necessary to get running. The ergonomic curve of the keyboard is gentle which I appreciate. Most other keyboards I have come across have a much stronger bend to them. The typing is responsive, though I am still trying to get my bearing with the position of the keys...actually I strongly recommend this to people who like the traditional style, but don't want to go with what feels like the arm twisting throwback....plus it's also not like some other, extreme mountainous keyboards I've worked with (Microsoft)...the raised portion is more gentle and fits cleanly in my desk. The keys make little noise, and is more conducive to working in an environment with others....no loud annoying clicks. I get some people like that, but your neighbor doesn't. As for the mouse, it's as functional as you can ask. It's responsive and moves just how it's supposed to. It's not a gaming mouse, but this set is really for people who need to get jobs done, and may want to sit with the keyboard in their lap, or even work in bed. Distance wise, it handles about 10-15ft pretty well, but if you're that far from your system, you're probably not able to read the screen. Oh, and another pleasant surprise, each item, keyboard and mouse, needed only 1 AA battery. Now, I know you're thinking 'I don't want to deal with batteries, lets get that rechargeable one.' My response is simply to be prepared to buy another keyboard when yours gives out. I've included pictures from above and the side to give you an idea of how high the center is. Please forgive the dust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded from my basic keyboard to this one for the ergonomic design. Great product for the price. This is just what I wanted for my home office for something a little nicer and easier on my hands. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars if you value your job....
reviews.reviewText: i've tested numerous wireless keyboards, i would say this is one of the worst i had. i work as purchasing and accts payable, i also do timesheets. i'm a heavy spreadsheet user. i received this Sunday and put it to work next day Monday. right off the bat i noticed that some key presses don't register. the keyboard and my office computer are 2 feet apart with line of sight, as the usb receiver is placed infront of the computer. i 'm a fast typist, while i was doing timesheets, i noticed there was alot of error, and i saw a few numbers incorrect. i'm pretty sure i typed it correctly. so i redid some of them, i slowed and i watched my key presses. i saw in real time that some numbers weren't registering and i had to press it twice. my timesheets are important because there will be complaints on underpaid personnel. my purchasing spreadhseets are equally important as they determine cost analysis. if they are incorrect, these errors will come back to me alone. now if you value your job, don't but this keyboard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice keyboard and mouse
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, so it's important to me to have a comfortable keyboard..and that is not loud when I'm clicking the keys! This works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This a great keyboard, subtle arch makes it easy to adjust to. Great price. The keys type smooth with little noise. Great product overall.*Update-It was working at first. Lately it is not keeping up and it has been lagging or not inputting what I'm typing at all by the end of the day. A very huge inconvenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice. No problems at all setting up and the shape of the keyboard and mouse are really nice. I was surprised what a difference it makes over a regular set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great . It’s very light and easy to use . It was just what I needed for my home office. Overall worth price and just as described
